dialogue.content: Dr. Morgan, thank you for coming in. I know this is a difficult time after losing your research partner. We just need to clarify a few details about last night... We'll keep it short, I promise.

context.title: Death in the Laboratory
context.description: Dr. Victor Kellerman, a prominent biochemist, was found dead in his private research laboratory at 7 AM. The cause of death appears to be poisoning from a rare chemical compound. You are Dr. Sarah Morgan, his research partner and former romantic interest, being questioned by Detective Rivera.
context.suspect_description: A brilliant biochemist. Dr. Victor Kellerman's research partner and former romantic interest.

charges.primary_charge: Murder in the first degree of Dr. Victor Kellerman

timeline.truth: Suspect and victim had heated argument about stolen research
Victim sent threatening email to suspect about patent lawsuit
Suspect used keycard to enter lab building
Suspect accessed chemical storage using victim's stolen keycard
Suspect placed poison in victim's coffee thermos
Security footage shows suspect leaving building
Victim arrived at lab and consumed poisoned coffee

evidence.description: Security footage showing suspect entering lab at 8:20 PM
Victim's stolen keycard found in suspect's car
Suspect's fingerprints on chemical storage cabinet
Threatening email from victim about patent theft
Toxicology report showing rare compound tetrodoxin
Suspect's recent financial difficulties and bankruptcy filing
Coffee thermos with poison residue in victim's lab

inspector_personality.tone: Initially sympathetic, becomes more confrontational as evidence emerges
inspector_personality.strategy: Build rapport, play the suspect's game first, try to make the suspect speak. Then, after gathering enough evidence (question 7 and after), confront with hard facts and wildcards.
